## impulse variable

Numeric version of [impulseT](./dsp.impulset.md)<!-- -->, using given `on` (default: 1) as initial value and zero for the remaining values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
impulse: (on?: number) => Impulse<number>
```
